quiz.question: Which statement about natural supplements equaling safety is true?
options: All natural supplements are safe at any dose
Natural supplements can have side effects and interact with medications
Natural means pharmaceutical-grade always
quiz.answer: Natural supplements can have side effects and interact with medications

quiz.question: Which myth about cold viruses and humidity reflects studies?
options: Low humidity environments can increase viral survival and transmission
High humidity makes viruses harmless instantly
Humidity has no effect on viral spread
quiz.answer: Low humidity environments can increase viral survival and transmission

quiz.question: Which historical example shows a high-profile health myth spread by celebrity endorsement?
options: A celebrity promoted laetrile as a cancer cure despite lack of evidence
Celebrities never influence public health beliefs
All celebrity-endorsed remedies were later proven effective
quiz.answer: A celebrity promoted laetrile as a cancer cure despite lack of evidence

quiz.question: Which claim about barefoot running preventing injuries is most accurate?
options: Barefoot running prevents all injuries for everyone
Some runners benefit from barefoot techniques, but injury risk varies
Barefoot running guarantees faster times
quiz.answer: Some runners benefit from barefoot techniques, but injury risk varies

quiz.question: Which finding about probiotic supplements and digestive health is accurate?
options: All probiotics cure every digestive disorder
Certain probiotic strains can help specific conditions, but results vary by strain and person
Probiotics permanently colonize everyone identically
quiz.answer: Certain probiotic strains can help specific conditions, but results vary by strain and person

quiz.question: Which risk is associated with excessive vitamin D supplementation documented in literature?
options: Very high vitamin D intake can cause hypercalcemia and related complications
High vitamin D always cures bone disease with no downside
Vitamin D has no toxicity at any dose
quiz.answer: Very high vitamin D intake can cause hypercalcemia and related complications

quiz.question: Which statement about sitting and exercise is true?
options: Short daily exercise completely cancels long sitting periods
Both regular exercise and reducing sitting improve health
Sitting has no effect on health if you exercise
quiz.answer: Both regular exercise and reducing sitting improve health

quiz.question: Which finding about energy drinks and endurance aligns with studies?
options: Energy drinks always improve endurance without side effects
Caffeine in energy drinks can temporarily boost performance but carries risks if overused
Energy drinks reverse dehydration automatically
quiz.answer: Caffeine in energy drinks can temporarily boost performance but carries risks if overused

quiz.question: Which epidemiological result links processed meat to cancer risk classifications?
options: IARC classified processed meat as a carcinogen associated with colorectal cancer risk
Processed meat was cleared as cancer-preventive
No agency has evaluated processed meat and cancer risk
quiz.answer: IARC classified processed meat as a carcinogen associated with colorectal cancer risk

quiz.question: Which belief about microwave ovens is correct?
options: Microwave ovens make food radioactive
Microwave ovens heat water molecules and do not cause radiation in food
Microwave ovens remove all nutrients from food
quiz.answer: Microwave ovens heat water molecules and do not cause radiation in food

quiz.question: Which statement about bone broth and joint healing reflects evidence?
options: Bone broth instantly regrows cartilage in joints
Bone broth provides nutrients but lacks strong evidence to regenerate cartilage alone
Bone broth is medicinally sterile always
quiz.answer: Bone broth provides nutrients but lacks strong evidence to regenerate cartilage alone

quiz.question: Which clinical observation challenges claims that raw milk is safer than pasteurized milk?
options: Raw milk poses higher risks of bacterial infections whereas pasteurization reduces those microbial risks
Raw milk cannot transmit pathogens
Pasteurization removes all nutritional value from milk
quiz.answer: Raw milk poses higher risks of bacterial infections whereas pasteurization reduces those microbial risks

quiz.question: Which historical fact explains the placebo-controlled trial surge in the 20th century?
options: The randomized, placebo-controlled trial design gained prominence post-World War II to evaluate therapies rigorously
Placebo trials were common in ancient medical schools
Placebo controls became legal requirements in the 1700s
quiz.answer: The randomized, placebo-controlled trial design gained prominence post-World War II to evaluate therapies rigorously

quiz.question: Which experimental result undermines claims that alkaline water significantly changes blood pH?
options: Human blood pH remains tightly regulated despite alkaline water consumption
Alkaline water permanently alkalizes blood in healthy adults
Alkaline water neutralizes stomach acid entirely
quiz.answer: Human blood pH remains tightly regulated despite alkaline water consumption

quiz.question: Which regulatory action addressed ear candling safety in the United States around 2007?
options: FDA issued warnings against ear candling due to burn and injury risks
CDC recommended ear candling for earwax removal nationally
EPA approved ear candling as a medical device
quiz.answer: FDA issued warnings against ear candling due to burn and injury risks
